#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t,a_cost,b_cost,x,l,sum,found,i;
	string a;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		found=0;
		sum=0;
		cin>>a;
		scanf("%d",&a_cost);
		scanf("%d",&b_cost);
		x=a_cost>b_cost?b_cost:a_cost;
		l=a.length();
		for(i=0;i<(l/2);i++)
		{
			if(a[i]=='/'||a[l-1-i]=='/')
			{
				if(a[i]=='/'&&a[l-1-i]=='/')
				sum+=x*2;
				else
				if((a[i]=='/'&&a[l-1-i]=='a')||(a[l-1-i]=='/'&&a[i]=='a'))
				sum+=a_cost;
				else
				sum+=b_cost;
			}
			else
			if(a[i]!=a[l-1-i])
			{
				found=1;
				break;
			}
		}
		if(found==1)
		printf("-1\n");
		else
		printf("%d\n",sum);
	}
}
